title: Pasha Mezze
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Catering, Middle Eastern, Turkish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A family-owned Turkish restaurant, opened in 2003. Authentic atmosphere and features Mediterranean and Anatolian cuisine with American and European influences, breakfast, daily specials, gluten-free and vegan choices. Veg items are clearly labeled. Brunch served on weekends from 10am-3pm. Next door is their coffeehouse where guest can enjoy a large selection of beverages and organic coffee. Has Wi-Fi.
